metadata.title: CVE-2021-22879 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: Nextcloud Desktop Client prior to 3.1.3 is vulnerable to resource injectionby way of missing validation of URLs, allowing a malicious server toexecute remote commands. User interaction is needed for exploitation.

criterions.comment: nextcloud-desktop package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
